consumption.validations.METERING_VALUE_START_GREATER_THAN_DOUBLE: Start value is greater than double scale value.
consumption.validations.METERING_VALUE_END_GREATER_THAN_DOUBLE_S: End value is greater than double scale value.

consumption.validations.DEVICE_INDEPENDENT_DEVICE_CONSUMPTION_EN: End value for consumption of non equipped metering point must not be changed.
consumption.validations.DEVICE_INDEPENDENT_DEVICE_CONSUMPTION_LA: Last consumption for device independent device consumptions must not be changed.
consumption.validations.DEVICE_INDEPENDENT_DEVICE_CONSUMPTION_US: Sum of consumption of non equipped metering point is greater than the consumption of the usage unit.
